item.title: Are we forgetting our past faster?
item.description: In a widely discussed paper, Michel and colleagues (2011) analyzed the content of more than five million digitized books in an attempt to identify long-term cultural trends. The data that they used has now been released as the Google NGrams dataset, and so we can use the data to replicate and extend some of their work.
